# Biogeochemistry Data

#Import
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)

toolik_biochem <- read.csv(here::here("data", "2011_Kling_Akchem.csv"), na.strings = c(".", "")) %>% clean_names()
inlet_biochem <- toolik_biochem %>% select(c("p_h", "doc_u_m", "tdn_u_m"))


print(mean(inlet_biochem[[1]], na.rm = TRUE))
print(mean(inlet_biochem[[2]], na.rm = TRUE))
print(mean(inlet_biochem[[3]], na.rm = TRUE))

for (i in seq_along(inlet_biochem)){
  mean <- mean(inlet_biochem[[i]], na.rm = TRUE)
  print(mean)
}

apply(inlet_biochem, 2, mean, na.rm = TRUE)
```
